data.text: Pagɛ ga nu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maamusɛ,
Pagɛ ɓalaa ga nu ɗa-nuɓɔɠɔlai laazeeli vai lɔɔzei sobui nɔ,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa kòozunɛɛzu naa ʋɔ, nii è kɛɛzu!
Nui ɠi ge la ma, é la kwɛɛ tago pa,
Anɛɛ ni nu ɲɔiti ta ʋɔnɔsu eɠɛ tufa lɛnugi,
Mazɔlɔɔ è zili nuiti pɛtɛ, ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI!
Ɗa sɛ̀bɛi wɔɔlɔzu, eɠɛ teɠui nɔnɔi,
Gàazu logɛ zobo sɔlɔɔ fai ʋa sìli nuiti ma,
Telebo nuiti ta ʋɔnɔsu eɠɛ dɔɔ wului,
Ti ziingɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-pɛlɛi wu,
Ta ɓuɠuzu ti wɔlɔzaɠa siɛgi zu,
ta dɛɛ ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zɔlegɛ,
